org.apache.accumulo.core.spi.scan
 

  • Uses of Stats in org.apache.accumulo.core.spi.scan

    Methods in org.apache.accumulo.core.spi.scan that return Stats
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Stats
    ScanInfo.getIdleTimeStats()
    Returns statistics about the time between running.
    Stats
    ScanInfo.getIdleTimeStats(long currentTime)
    This method is similar to ScanInfo.getIdleTimeStats(), but it also includes the time period between the last run time and now in the stats.
    Stats
    ScanInfo.getRunTimeStats()
    Returns timing statistics about running and gathering a batches of data.
